Reviews.Title: “Get what you pay for but service abismal!”

Reviews.Content: werent expecting budget booking expected hotel bit makeover tatty inside clean main gripe closure hotel meant pretty poor especially detail website passports leave little cubby hole bar unmanned half time ownermanager unfriendly pretty straight stating hotel closes door locked 1am time stated website transpired electronic card attached key didnt tell thats key card attached booked x2 card attached hotel quiete time visible guests woken friday morning idiot door playing music 530am hotel bothered reflection hotel basic reasonably clean tatty towels available little else friends plastic cups water noisy unplugged mini bar stated website bedding shower etc clean tidy decour updating double beds singles pushed including single matresses lights cleaner knock entering twice morning knocking thrid day learnt previous review lady time helpful friendly told key card breakfast basic pastries expecting price overall nice location bit remote buses run venice 30 mins pizzeria bus stop food beer dont reccomend hotel mainly due poor service offered thanks lady reception exception
